messages.content:
You are an AI assistant specialized in analyzing web projects developed using PHP and the Laravel 11.x (laravel/framework ^11.28) framework. I need to generate an OpenAPI Specification for a web project based on its backend source code. I'm now focusing on endpoint `/v1/comments` with method GET, and here is the relevant information I found:

1. In `app/Http/Controllers/Api/V1/CommentController.php`, `CommentController` is implemented to process HTTP requests to `/v1/comments` with HTTP method GET.

2. In `app/Http/Controllers/Api/V1/CommentController.php`, `App\\Http\\Controllers\\Api\\V1\\CommentController@index` is implemented to process HTTP requests to `/v1/comments` with HTTP method GET.

I'll provide you with the contents of the files mentioned above, you have the option to execute additional Unix commands to gather more information if necessary, but you must not run the source code of the project, and your task is to generate a dict of Response Objects (the value of paths.[endpoint].[method].responses) in Swagger 2.0 format.

You need to think step by step and provide an explanation of your results first. Then, output exactly "the final generated result begins", followed by the dict of Response Objects in JSON format. Do not include fields not mentioned above, and do not use references ($ref) in your output (try to obtain the structure by executing additional Unix commands).

function.name: run_command
function.description: Run a Unix command and get outputs in the project directory. You must not run any source code of the project.

message.content:
Explanation â€” reasoning and sources:
- The GET /v1/comments route is handled by App\Http\Controllers\Api\V1\CommentController@index.
- That method returns CommentResource::collection(Comment::latest()->paginate($request->input('limit', 20))). So the response is a paginated ResourceCollection using the Comment resource.
- The Comment resource (app/Http/Resources/Comment.php) serializes each comment with these fields:
  - id (integer)
  - content (string)
  - posted_at (ISO 8601 string)
  - humanized_posted_at (string)
  - author_id (integer)
  - post_id (integer)
  - author_name (string)
  - author_url (string URL)
  - can_delete (boolean)
- When Laravel returns a paginated resource collection, the JSON structure includes top-level keys: data (array of resource objects), links (object with first/last/prev/next URLs), and meta (pagination metadata: current_page, from, last_page, links array, path, per_page, to, total).
- Based on the above, the Swagger 2.0 Responses object for the GET /v1/comments endpoint should include a 200 response with a schema describing an object containing data, links, and meta. No $ref usage is included.

the final generated result begins
{"200":{"description":"A paginated list of comments","schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"data":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"content":{"type":"string"},"posted_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"ISO 8601 timestamp"},"humanized_posted_at":{"type":"string"},"author_id":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"post_id":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"},"author_name":{"type":"string"},"author_url":{"type":"string","format":"uri"},"can_delete":{"type":"boolean"}},"required":["id","content","posted_at","humanized_posted_at","author_id","post_id","author_name","author_url","can_delete"]}},"links":{"type":"object","properties":{"first":{"type":"string","description":"URL of first page or null"},"last":{"type":"string","description":"URL of last page or null"},"prev":{"type":"string","description":"URL of previous page or null"},"next":{"type":"string","description":"URL of next page or null"}},"required":["first","last","prev","next"]},"meta":{"type":"object","properties":{"current_page":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"from":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","description":"First item index on this page or null"},"last_page":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"links":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"url":{"type":"string","description":"Page URL or null"},"label":{"type":"string"},"active":{"type":"boolean"}},"required":["url","label","active"]}},"path":{"type":"string","description":"Base path for pagination links"},"per_page":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"to":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","description":"Last item index on this page or null"},"total":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"required":["current_page","last_page","per_page","total"]}},"required":["data","links","meta"]}}}
